005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticMetapathException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IItemType;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.ISequenceType;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.Occurrence;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.IEnhancedQName;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
016
017import java.util.Objects;
018
019import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
020
021/**
022 * Represents a single function argument signature.
023 */
024public interface IArgument {
025  /**
026   * Get the argument's name.
027   *
028   * @return the argument's name
029   */
030  @NonNull
031  String getName();
032
033  /**
034   * Get information about the type of sequence supported by the argument.
035   *
036   * @return the sequence information
037   */
038  @NonNull
039  ISequenceType getSequenceType();
040
041  /**
042   * Get the signature of the argument.
043   *
044   * @return the argument's signature
045   */
046  @NonNull
047  String toSignature();
048
049  /**
050   * Get a new argument builder.
051   *
052   * @return the new argument builder
053   */
054  @NonNull
055  static Builder builder() {
056    return new Builder();
057  }
058
059  /**
060   * Used to create an argument's signature using a builder pattern.
061   */
062  final class Builder {
063    private String name;
064    @NonNull
065    private IItemType type;
066    private Occurrence occurrence;
067
068    private Builder() {
069      // construct a new non-initialized builder
070      this.type = IItem.type();
071    }
072
073    /**
074     * Define the name of the function argument.
075     *
076     * @param name
077     *          the argument's name
078     * @return this builder
079     */
080    @NonNull
081    public Builder name(@NonNull String name) {
082      if (Objects.requireNonNull(name, "name").isBlank()) {
083        throw new IllegalArgumentException("the name must be non-blank");
084      }
085      this.name = name.trim();
086      return this;
087    }
088
089    /**
090     * Define the type of the function argument.
091     * <p>
092     * By default an argument has the type {@link IItem}.
093     *
094     * @param name
095     *          the qualified name of the argument's type
096     * @return this builder
097     */
098    @NonNull
099    public Builder type(@NonNull IEnhancedQName name) {
100      try {
101        this.type = StaticContext.lookupAtomicType(name);
102      } catch (StaticMetapathException ex) {
103        throw new IllegalArgumentException(
104            String.format("No data type with the name '%s'.", name), ex);
105      }
106      return this;
107    }
108
109    /**
110     * Define the type of the function argument.
111     * <p>
112     * By default an argument has the type {@link IItem}.
113     *
114     * @param type
115     *          the argument's type
116     * @return this builder
117     */
118    @NonNull
119    public Builder type(@NonNull IItemType type) {
120      this.type = type;
121      return this;
122    }
123
124    /**
125     * Identifies the argument's cardinality as a single, optional item (zero or
126     * one).
127     *
128     * @return this builder
129     */
130    @NonNull
131    public Builder zeroOrOne() {
132      return occurrence(Occurrence.ZERO_OR_ONE);
133    }
134
135    /**
136     * Identifies the argument's cardinality as a single, required item (one).
137     *
138     * @return this builder
139     */
140    @NonNull
141    public Builder one() {
142      return occurrence(Occurrence.ONE);
143    }
144
145    /**
146     * Identifies the argument's cardinality as an optional series of items (zero or
147     * more).
148     *
149     * @return this builder
150     */
151    @NonNull
152    public Builder zeroOrMore() {
153      return occurrence(Occurrence.ZERO_OR_MORE);
154    }
155
156    /**
157     * Identifies the argument's cardinality as a required series of items (one or
158     * more).
159     *
160     * @return this builder
161     */
162    @NonNull
163    public Builder oneOrMore() {
164      return occurrence(Occurrence.ONE_OR_MORE);
165    }
166
167    @NonNull
168    private Builder occurrence(@NonNull Occurrence occurrence) {
169      Objects.requireNonNull(occurrence, "occurrence");
170      this.occurrence = occurrence;
171      return this;
172    }
173
174    /**
175     * Builds the argument's signature.
176     *
177     * @return the argument's signature
178     */
179    @NonNull
180    public IArgument build() {
181      return new ArgumentImpl(
182          ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(name, "the argument name must not be null"),
183          ISequenceType.of(type, ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(occurrence, "occurrence")));
184    }
185  }
186}
